title: Leavebuster...
body: Riot please fix leave buster I was playing a normal game with my friends then I saw connection error I pressed retry but it still couldn't work, so I restarted my computer so I could rejoin the game but it would not let me. This is a big issue, many people left for an important reason, you should make an option why you are going to leave the game so it will be fair for everyone that has left. Please if you don't fix leavebuster many will quit league.

replies.body: You don't get leaverbuster for one game.  WAD

I got team full of feeders and couldnt do anything with supp blitz so i was just standing in base and got 1 afk restriction or whatever and didnt get exp or anything for 30 minutes of my precious time. GJ rito.

you are punished because you gave your team a bad experience.
if rito disconnected you, send a ticket.
